reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with a lightweight design that looks true to size. They appreciate its casual style and adore its color, with one customer noting it looks expensive. The fit receives positive feedback, with one mentioning it works well for petite customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice top with a good price.
items.body: I liked it so much that I just ordered 2 more in different colors. Nice weight, soft and the coffee is a great color. I hope that it washes up nice. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Nicely made . Lightweight. Soft touch . Read more
items.author: GB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! ðŸ¥°
items.body: Absolutely love. This sweater is super soft, super stretchy and lightweight. In the winter, I love lightweight layering pieces so I donâ€™t feel bulky under my coat. Color was also an exact match to what is shown. I want to buy more of these!!! One thing to note: my suggested size from Amazon is a Large, but I sized up based off of a recommendation of a friend who has this sweater. I bought XXL, and straight out of the package I thought Iâ€™d made a mistake because it looked huge! I threw it in the wash and dried it, and it shrunk significantly making it absolutely a perfect fit. I donâ€™t know if others will have this experience. But if you plan to wash and dry in the machines, maybe size up a bit. Read more
items.author: aeden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft and so comfortable
items.body: super comfortable material and fits great, i ordered an xl and has plenty of room Read more
items.author: Kathryn M.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit too small.
items.body: This shirt is very cute. It looks true to size when I ordered it, but It was a bit too small. I'd order a size up. Read more
items.author: Ryan and Kari

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality
items.body: True to size, 150lb 5'6"/ I have smaller upper body and chest. I went with a small. size up if you want more of a loose fit. Read more
items.author: krystal D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about the shirt EXCEPT the material
items.body: I'm kinda disappointed with this top. I like the way it looks. The style suits me to a T. It's exactly the casual, laid back, relaxed style that I love. I absolutely adore the color. Seriously, this is like my favorite color. The fit... well, it's ok, but i wish I'd gone with a L instead of my normal size M, but the M fits fine because it has quite a bit of stretch. But all of that doesn't matter when I do not like the material. Like, I don't like the material AT ALL! It feels really nice on the outside, but the inside of the shirt feels horrible. Honestly, it just feels really cheap on the inside. Kinda stiff and rough and itchy. I'm debating on if I should just return it or take a chance on washing it to see if it will soften up some. Since i love everything else about the shirt, I will probably keep it and hope it feels better after i wash it. Hopefully it does, otherwise I'll be stuck with a shirt that I won't wear just because i dislike how it feels. I'll update to make my recommendation after i see if it washes up well. Read more
items.author: Amber Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater!
items.body: I ordered an off-white sweater and it is so comfortable! Lightweight, could be dressy or casual. I would call this a year round sweater. I am 5â€™4â€ and 135lbs. I couldâ€™ve worn a medium, however, I ordered a large and itâ€™s a little baggy, but thatâ€™s exactly what I wanted. I love this sweater and I will be ordering more. This is a great company to do business with. They were fast and courteous. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Purple, Gray, Off-white, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Coffee, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
